notif.csv-required: EasyTables require the Values field to be filled
notif.tabledata-required: EasyTables require the Table Data field to be filled
notif.separator-required: EasyTables require the Separator field to contain a single character

csv.title: EasyTable from Values
csv.csv-data-tooltip: Paste your values here, separated by the Separator character
csv.defaultcollection-tooltip: Any untagged entries will be checked against this entity type

tablepaste.title: EasyTable Table Paste Mode
tablepaste.table-data: Table Data - DO NOT include a table header here. Set the title above.
tablepaste.safemode-tooltip: Enable this if your pasted table isn't generating as expected.

output.title: EasyTable Export Complete
output.separator-issue-head: Your chosen separator was found in some results. Your table might not import correctly.
output.separator-issue-hint: Try using another separator that doesn't appear in the text, like a vertical pipe `|`

defaults.title: EasyTable
defaults.description: An easy table. Optional {} denotes weight
